modName: Simple Bat - Force Marriage and Divorce
summary: These are simple bat files that can be used to simplify a sequence of commands that can be used through the console while in game.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Attention the file is downloadable through NMM just to make easier to keep track of the updates. The installation should still be manual.[/color]

[color=green]Endorsements are appreciated.[/color]

[b]--> Description:[/b]
These are simple bat files that can be used to simplify a sequence of commands that can be used through the console while in game.

[b]--> Usage:[/b]
--> Force Marriage <--
[color=red]* First of all beware that if a NPC was not meant to be married marrying it could make it buggy, and some may even be impossible to marry even with this commands so be careful and try to make frequent saves to avoid such.[/color]
- Open up the console pressing the Tilde Key (Usually \"~\", it is the one right bellow the ESC button which may vary depending on your keyboard localization).
- Click on the NPC which you wish to make \"marriable\"
- Now write \"bat forcemarriage\" without the \"\".
- A sequence of commands will be automatically used and.. you\'re done. If you\'ve already talked to the Maramal in Riften about the marriage quest triggering dialogues and have an Amulet of Mara equipped you may now marry whoever you choose!

--> Divorce <--
- Open up the console pressing the Tilde Key (Usually \"~\", it is the one right bellow the ESC button which may vary depending on your keyboard localization).
- Click on the NPC which you\'re married to.
- Now write \"bat divorce\" without the \"\".
- A sequence of commands will be automatically used and.. you\'re done. Your quest is reset to the point all you need to do is equip an Amulet of Mara to find yourself a new wife and your marriage \"feels like it never existed\".

[b]--> Installation:[/b]
- Extract the text files to you Skyrim root folder. (The same folder as your TESV.exe)
Most likely (...\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim)

[b]--> Recommended:[/b]
- I recommend the usage of the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11579]joeThinkStudios\'s Marriage Mod[/url] which is available in the Steam Workshop.
author: Opedreee

files.name: Simple Bat - Force Marriage and Divorce
